subject: Real world
description_text:
Hi guys

Does this

Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1
Able to be used in a real race car as I’m building a track/rally around car as I use it as my daily too I know the wheel connecting to the car will work but the buttons is what I’m more wondering if you have herd of it being down

Regards
John
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi John f,    We do not recommend using this steering wheel in a real car, as it has not been tested for real-vehicle applications and may pose safety risks.

hi
Ok thankyou for your reply

Regards
John

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
